quality_assessment: Page has incorrect field name for deduplication (deduplicate_by vs distinct), otherwise accurate and well-structured

issues.description: Documentation uses 'deduplicate_by' but the actual field name in code is 'distinct'
issues.fix_suggestion: Replace all occurrences of 'deduplicate_by' with 'distinct' throughout the page

issues.description: Documentation doesn't explicitly state the order of operations in the data pipeline
issues.fix_suggestion: Add a section explaining the processing order: 1) JSONPath extraction, 2) Filtering, 3) Sorting, 4) Deduplication, 5) Offset, 6) Limit

issues.description: Missing clarification about how null values are handled in deduplication
issues.fix_suggestion: Add note that items with null values for the distinct field are treated as 'null' key and deduplicated together

issues.description: Filter evaluation behavior not fully explained - what happens if field doesn't exist?
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that accessing non-existent fields in filter expressions returns false (item is filtered out)

positive_aspects: Good overview of all work distribution features
Excellent combining features example showing real-world usage
Work item variable interpolation is well documented
All internal links are valid and correctly formatted
Cross-references to related pages are appropriate
improvement_suggestions: Add a 'Processing Pipeline Order' section explaining the sequence of operations
Include a troubleshooting subsection for common issues (empty results, unexpected filtering)
Add performance considerations for large datasets
Consider adding an example showing JSONPath filtering vs filter expression - when to use which

metadata.validation_focus: Check work item management, JSONPath usage, filtering, and sorting are documented
